title: Mob Vandalises 3 Hindu Temples in Bangladesh's Chattogram
content: Three Hindu temples were vandalised by a slogan-shouting mob on Friday in Bangladesh's Chattogram which has witnessed protests and violence since a former ISKCON member was booked under sedition charges.
summary: Three Hindu temples were vandalised by a slogan-shouting mob on Friday in Bangladesh's Chattogram which has witnessed protests and violence since a former ISKCON member was booked under sedition charges.

title: What The Pink Elephant Test Reveals About Your Ability To Control Thoughts
content: In a new study, we have found evidence the pink elephant problem is not universal. Some people  including people with aphantasia can block involuntary visual thoughts from their minds.
summary: In a new study, we have found evidence the pink elephant problem is not universal. Some people  including people with aphantasia can block involuntary visual thoughts from their minds.

title: Four-Year Ban On Pakistan State Airline Lifted By European Union
content: The European Union's aviation authorities have lifted a four-year ban on Pakistan's beleaguered national airline that was at the centre of a pilot license scandal, officials said Friday.
summary: The European Union's aviation authorities have lifted a four-year ban on Pakistan's beleaguered national airline that was at the centre of a pilot license scandal, officials said Friday.

title: US Colleges Urge Foreign Students To Return Ahead Of Trump's Swearing-In
content: Several American universities have issued travel advisories for their international students as well as staff and urged them to return to the US before President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration in January next year amid concerns over travel bans.
summary: Several American universities have issued travel advisories for their international students as well as staff and urged them to return to the US before President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration in January next year amid concerns over travel bans.

title: Crisis In Gaza Deteriorates As Palestinians Seen Scavenging In Landfills
content: Palestinians are suffering on an unprecedented scale, with the situation in Gaza City being described as "horrendous" by Ajith Sunghay, head of the UN Human Rights Office in the Palestinian territories.
summary: Palestinians are suffering on an unprecedented scale, with the situation in Gaza City being described as "horrendous" by Ajith Sunghay, head of the UN Human Rights Office in the Palestinian territories.

title: Hindus Across Bangladesh Being Subjected To Death: UK MP
content: UK member of Parliament Bob Blackman, chair of the All Party Parliamentary Group (APPG) for British Hindus, has raised concerns in the House of Commons over the attacks on Hindus in Bangladesh.
summary: UK member of Parliament Bob Blackman, chair of the All Party Parliamentary Group (APPG) for British Hindus, has raised concerns in the House of Commons over the attacks on Hindus in Bangladesh.

title: 'Great Victory' Against Israel: Hezbollah Chief
content: Hezbollah chief Naim Qassem on Friday declared a "great victory" against Israel in his first speech since a ceasefire went into effect in Lebanon.
summary: Hezbollah chief Naim Qassem on Friday declared a "great victory" against Israel in his first speech since a ceasefire went into effect in Lebanon.

title: Iran Nuclear Ambitions 'Threaten All Of Us': UK Foreign Intelligence Chief
content: Iran's nuclear ambitions pose a major global security threat even after setbacks dealt to Hamas and Hezbollah, the UK's foreign intelligence chief said Friday.
summary: Iran's nuclear ambitions pose a major global security threat even after setbacks dealt to Hamas and Hezbollah, the UK's foreign intelligence chief said Friday.

title: Ukraine Says Russia Returned More Than 500 Soldiers' Bodies
content: Kyiv on Friday said Russian authorities returned over 500 bodies of Ukrainian soldiers killed in combat, with most having died in the eastern Donetsk region.
summary: Kyiv on Friday said Russian authorities returned over 500 bodies of Ukrainian soldiers killed in combat, with most having died in the eastern Donetsk region.

title: Video: Musk Grooves To YMCA As He Celebrates Thanksgiving With Trump
content: US President-elect Donald Trump and Tesla CEO Elon Musk have been nearly inseparable since the elections earlier this month and their bonhomie was once again at display, during a Thanksgiving dinner in Florida.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump and Tesla CEO Elon Musk have been nearly inseparable since the elections earlier this month and their bonhomie was once again at display, during a Thanksgiving dinner in Florida.

title: UK's Assisted Dying Bill A Step Closer To Reality As MPs Vote In Favour
content: The Terminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill can now go through a lengthy process of amendments by the House of Lords before becoming a law - since the bill got 330 votes in favour and 275 against.
summary: The Terminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill can now go through a lengthy process of amendments by the House of Lords before becoming a law - since the bill got 330 votes in favour and 275 against.

title: World Court To Begin Hearings That May Shape Global Climate Litigation
content: The United Nations' top court next week begins hearings on the legal obligation of countries to fight climate change and the consequences for states of contributing to global warming, the outcome of which could influence litigation worldwide.
summary: The United Nations' top court next week begins hearings on the legal obligation of countries to fight climate change and the consequences for states of contributing to global warming, the outcome of which could influence litigation worldwide.

title: Dozens Feared Dead As Boat Capsizes In Nigeria
content: Dozens of people were feared dead after a boat capsized on the Niger River in central Nigeria, a waterways agency spokesperson said on Friday.
summary: Dozens of people were feared dead after a boat capsized on the Niger River in central Nigeria, a waterways agency spokesperson said on Friday.

title: "Notre Dame Reconstruction Teams Did What Was Thought Impossible"
content: French President Emmanuel Macron on Friday inspected the gleaming restored interior of Notre Dame cathedral, saying workers had done the "impossible" by healing a "national wound" caused by a 2019 fire that ravaged the mediaeval landmark.
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron on Friday inspected the gleaming restored interior of Notre Dame cathedral, saying workers had done the "impossible" by healing a "national wound" caused by a 2019 fire that ravaged the mediaeval landmark.

title: Pics: Gothic Grandeur Of Notre-Dame Cathedral, Gutted By Fire, Restored
content: French President Emmanuel Macron praised on Friday the more than 1,000 craftspeople who helped rebuild Paris' Notre-Dame Cathedral in what he called "the project of the century", five-and-a-half years after fire gutted the Gothic masterpiece.
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron praised on Friday the more than 1,000 craftspeople who helped rebuild Paris' Notre-Dame Cathedral in what he called "the project of the century", five-and-a-half years after fire gutted the Gothic masterpiece.

title: Asteroid Ryugu Sample Was 'Rapidly Colonised' By Earth Bacteria: Study
content: The sample from the asteroid Ryugu was overrun with Earth-based life forms after they were brought to the planet, scientists have concluded in a study.
summary: The sample from the asteroid Ryugu was overrun with Earth-based life forms after they were brought to the planet, scientists have concluded in a study.

title: As Thanksgiving Dish Turducken Trends, It's Link To NFL Legend John Madden
content: This celebrated dish was brought to prominence by NFL legend John Madden, football coach and commentator, in 1996 during a game between the New Orleans Saints and St. Louis Rams at the Louisiana Superdome.
summary: This celebrated dish was brought to prominence by NFL legend John Madden, football coach and commentator, in 1996 during a game between the New Orleans Saints and St. Louis Rams at the Louisiana Superdome.

title: Jocelyn Wildenstein Claims She's "Never" Had Plastic Surgery: Report
content: Jocelyn Wildenstein, the 84-year-old Swiss socialite known as "Catwoman" due to her extensive plastic surgeries, has denied getting any work done on her face.
summary: Jocelyn Wildenstein, the 84-year-old Swiss socialite known as "Catwoman" due to her extensive plastic surgeries, has denied getting any work done on her face.

title: How Germany's Patriot Air Defence Systems Will Protect Ukraine Via Poland
content: Germany has offered to re-deploy Patriot air defence systems to NATO ally Poland at the start of the new year, the German defence ministry said on Thursday.
summary: Germany has offered to re-deploy Patriot air defence systems to NATO ally Poland at the start of the new year, the German defence ministry said on Thursday.

title: Kayaker, Trapped On Australian River, Gets Leg Amputated In 20-Hour Rescue
content: The man was navigating rapids in Tasmania's Franklin River with some friends on Friday when his leg got "wedged between rocks".
summary: The man was navigating rapids in Tasmania's Franklin River with some friends on Friday when his leg got "wedged between rocks".
